content: 12 double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook alternatively you can use a magic_ring instead of the chain 3 and crochet 12 double_crochet in the magic_ring slip_stitch to join round leave a 12 tail to sew cheek to head fasten_off tail with mc chain 6 making the 1st chain very loose 12 qc in 6th chain from hook holding the last loop of each qc on the hook fig 5 you may need to keep increasing the size of the 6th chain by pulling more yarn from the cast-on tail in order to fit in the 12 qc s *yarn over and take off all remaining loops a tight chain st should then be made to fasten the cluster fig 6 pull cast-on tail to tighten bottom of cluster fig 7 alternatively you can use a magic_ring chain 6 and then crochet 12 qc in the magic_ring continue from * leave a 12 tail to sew tail to body and fasten_off © 2008 hooked on fauna all rights reserved - 3 - sniffles the bunny finishing 1 stuff body do not sew shut you may wish to put some plastic pellets in the bottom of the body before stuffing to add some weight and stability if you do i recommend placing the pellets inside a small fabric pouch before putting them in the body otherwise they are likely to eventually fall out between the spaces of the single crochets this is not only messy but also a potential choking hazard for small children i cut two circles roughly 3 in diameter from scrap fabric sew them together leaving a 1 opening fill the pouch with a scant ¼ cup of pellets and then stitch the opening shut 2 sew head to body using inside loops only of last round of body 3 stuff arms lightly and sew to body 4 flatten tail and sew to body fig 8 5 weave ends in ears and then sew ears to face i usually sew them between round 8 & 9 6 sew cheeks to face using inside loops only of last round of cheeks 7 sew felt eyes to face alternatively embroider eyes to face 8 embroider eyebrows and whiskers fig 9 © 2008 hooked on fauna all rights reserved -
